Improving Everyday Life With Robotics
OUR MISSION
We Teach More Than Just Notes and Rhythms
The mission of the South Florida Conservatory of Music¬†is to provide exceptional music education that fosters artistic growth, personal development, and a lifelong appreciation for music.
We are dedicated to nurturing talent, inspiring excellence, and building a supportive community for students of all ages and skill levels, empowering them to achieve their musical aspirations and enrich their lives through the transformative power of music.
Operational Excellence
OUR VISION
Inspiring Excellence and Life Skills Through Music
The vision of the South Florida Conservatory of Music is to be a leading institution in music education, recognized for our commitment to excellence, innovation, and community engagement. We aim to inspire and empower students to reach their highest potential, fostering a love for music that transcends generations.
Through our comprehensive programs and dedicated faculty, we strive to cultivate a vibrant cultural hub that celebrates diversity, creativity, and the transformative power of music. Additionally, we provide opportunities for local musicians to pass on their knowledge and experience, enriching the community and nurturing the next generation of musicians.
WHO WE ARE
Meet the Founder
This is the space to introduce the team and what makes it special. Describe the team culture and work philosophy. To help site visitors connect with the team, add details about team members‚Äô experience and skills.
PRESS
Volaso in the News
MARK DEMIDOVICH
FOUNDER | CEO
Guiding the future of music education
Mark Demidovich, the founder and CEO of the South Florida Conservatory of Music, has dedicated his life to the transformative power of music. Starting piano at age 7 in Kostroma, Russia, Mark has over 15 years of teaching experience, impacting countless lives through his passion and expertise.
‚Äã
From 2006 to 2011, Mark studied at the Saratov State Conservatory under Professor Albert Tarakanov. After moving to the U.S. in 2011, he continued his education with Professor Tamara Poddubnaya at the Long Island Conservatory of Music.
‚Äã
Mark's career includes numerous international competition victories and performances at prestigious venues like the White House, Carnegie Hall, and Lincoln Center. Despite these accomplishments, his dream was to open his own music school. "I want to bring music into as many lives as possible, and having my own school allows me to make that impact," he shares.
Since 2008, Mark has developed a student-centered teaching method combining traditional techniques with contemporary learning studies. His approach has successfully guided students from ages 4 to 75.
‚Äã
Deeply committed to his community, Mark actively engages in local music events and fosters a nurturing environment for budding musicians. Through the South Florida Conservatory of Music, he continues to inspire and empower the next generation of musicians, one lesson at a time.
This is the space to introduce visitors to the business or brand. Briefly explain who's behind it, what it does and what makes it unique. Share its core values and what this site has to offer.

Vivian Ortega
Voice/Piano Instructor
Vivian Ortega is an award-winning vocalist, musician, and educator with extensive experience in teaching and performance who is passionate about music and helping students reach their potential through education and the arts...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Taylor Shea
Viola/Violin Instructor
Taylor holds a Bachelor of Music degree from The Juilliard School, as well as a Professional Performer‚Äôs Certificate and Master of Music degree from Penn State University. Outside of his musical pursuits, Taylor enjoys brewing freshly-ground coffee, gardening, baking pastries, and running...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Jiaman Li
Piano Instructor
Jiaman Li is a pianist and educator currently completing her Doctor of Musical Arts in Keyboard Performance and Pedagogy at the University of Miami‚Äôs Frost School of Music...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Aramis Fernandez
Drum/Piano/Guitar Instructor
Aramis Fernandez is a highly versatile professional drummer who has been teaching since 2021. Born In Miami, Florida, he has been influenced by the bustling metropolitan, Caribbean sounds of South Florida from a young age...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Francisca Balass
Violin/Piano/Flute Instructor
Mrs. Balass has been a private teacher since 2014.  As a devoted musician, she has a long history of using music as a tool for social integration, education, and healing...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Collin Holloway
Guitar Instructor
Collin's performing experience is extensive for a guitarist of his age. He has toured across much of America and Spain as a soloist and as a part of various ensembles in festivals such as ‚ÄúAustin City Limits‚Äù, ‚ÄúCHAMBERart Madrid‚Äù, the ‚ÄúCeledonio Romero Guitar institute‚Äù, in addition to a recent solo tour of Oklahoma and Florida...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Gabriela Serpa
Voice Instructor
Gabriela Serpa Saade is a Venezuelan born, South Florida raised musician, beginning her teaching career in 2018. She earned her Bachelor's Degree in Choral Music Education at the Florida State University College of Music where she graduated Magna Cum Laude in 2022...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Blake Cabrera
Piano Instructor
Blake Cabrera began teaching piano in 2018. He is an up-and-coming classical pianist and composer. He has won multiple piano competitions including the Manolov International Piano Competition based in New York and the South Florida International Piano Competition...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Isaac Casal
Cello Instructor
I began teaching in 1998. My profile includes comprehensive training in cello performance, broad international exposure, extensive teaching experience, and 15 years of managing an international music festival and non-profit foundation..
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Mauricio Silva
Guitar/Violin/Piano Instructor
Mauricio Silva is a world-class professional musician and esteemed educator with over 20 years of training and experience in the realm of music...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Yaron Sarch
Piano/Guitar/Songwriting Instructor
Mr. Sarch has been a music teacher for over 20 years. He is currently pursuing his Doctorate in Music Education from Boston University. He earned his Masters in Music Education from the University of Miami and completed his Bachelor of Music Degree in Songwriting from the Berkelee College of Music in Boston...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Chloe Hernandez
Front Desk
Chloe is a South Florida native who's currently immersed in pursuing a bachelor's degree in Digital Media & Production at FIU...
Read More
xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?
Our faculty comprises exceptional musicians and educators with extensive teaching and performance backgrounds, hailing from renowned institutions such as¬†Juilliard, Eastman, Berklee, the University of North Texas, and beyond.
